item.title: Removed Link
item.description: I dropped the link to my notes from EchoFeed. The main reason was visitors to the site can read them; folks that follow me on Mastodon see them and I didn’t think a link back was necessary in my particular case (at the moment and subject to change on how I feel at any moment). Ymwv.
item.dc:creator: Jason

item.title: Added a CMS
item.description: I might have added a CMS to my site, which will make adding posts remotely from the web far easier. This quick note is testing that theory. (This properly added tags to it.)
item.dc:creator: Jason

item.title: My first micropost
item.description: I wanted a way to post short ‘notes’ to my site, generate an rss feed, and then have them post to social media. I think I have it working with some tweaking and using EchoFeed as well as, in essence, a running timeline of them on my site under Notes.
item.dc:creator: Jason
